original_title: Make Love たくさん遠回りしたけれど、大好きな彼との愛し合うSexが結局一番幸せ
overview: Acting actress Iori Furukawa, the last drama work. The original plan of Iori Furukawa, which is packed with his ideals and views of love, a strong and dangerous woman's love story. A dangerous man who fell in love with his youth, and a blazing affair with his boss. I've been taking a lot of detours, hurt, and I know it's sour and sweet, but after all, Sex is the happiest with him who is watching over me.
title: Make Love たくさん遠回りしたけれど、大好きな彼との愛し合うSexが結局一番幸せ
